most_popular.description: If true, the integration is sorted to the top of the list of integrations.

install_description.description: Describes basic information about how to deploy on this platform.

methods.description: Describes the various ways to deploy on this platform.

method.description: The name of the installation method.

channel.description: The release channel that this command is used for.

command.description: The command to run for installing using this method.

additional_info.description: Any additional information about this platform.

clean_additional_info.description: Any additional information about this platform, without any embedded custom tags.

platform_info.description: References what platform this deployment info is for. In the parsed output, this will be replaced with a markdown string covering basic support information for this platform.

group.description: Identifies the group that the platform is in. 'include' is used for platforms that are in auto-generated CI. 'no_include' is used for platforms that are not in auto-generated CI. An empty string indicates no associated platform information.

distro.description: Identifies the platform within the group, based on the value of the 'distro' key.

quick_start.description: Indicates where the deploy integration should appear in the add nodes dialogue. A value less than 0 indicates that it should not appear on this dialogue.
